ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-14T03:43:28 [Issue ID 4000-358902] urn:comicvine:4000-358902
ComicInfo.Summary: The "INQUISITION" storyline reaches its dramatic conclusion in this issue! Vampirella must defend her recent actions and prove that she hasn't been corrupted by the influence of Chaos...before her most powerful enemy drives her to madness! The balance of the universe rests upon Vampirella's shoulders, and the weight may be too much for her to bear!
ComicInfo.Tags: Adam Van Helsing,Le Fanu,Lilith,Lilitu,Lorelei,Mad God Chaos,Madek,Magdelene,Pantha,Pendragon,Scarlet Legion,Sofia Murray,Vampirella,Vampirella: Inquisition,Von Kreist
ComicInfo.Title: Vampirella: Inquisition, Part 3 - The Burden of Proof
